text: Here's how to play Steam games on Quest 2
via USB cable or an Air Link connection.
Make sure your computer is compatible
by checking the link in the description.
You'll need a USB-C cable like this

that can reach your
computer from your headset.
You can get one directly from Oculus
via the link in the description.

First, make sure you have
both the Quest 2 desktop app
and Steam app installed on your computer.

Within Steam, make sure
you've downloaded SteamVR.
Open Steam and the SteamVR app.
Turn on your Quest 2 and connect it
to your computer using your USB cable.
Open the Quest app.
Click on the devices tab.
Then click "Add Headset."
Select USB cable and follow the prompts
to connect your headset to your computer.

Your desktop will now
appear in your headset.
Click on "Start SteamVR."

You'll now have access
to your SteamVR games
in your headset.
To play Steam games via Air Link
and without a cable,

make sure you have a
strong WiFi connection
for this to work well.

First, make sure you have
both the Quest 2 desktop app
and Steam app installed on your computer.

Within Steam, make sure
you've downloaded SteamVR.
Open Steam and the SteamVR app.
Open the Quest app on your computer.
Now put on your Quest 2 headset.

Press the Oculus button on
your right-hand controller.

From the home menu, click
on "Oculus Air Link."
A pop-up will appear.
Select your computer and click "Launch."
A code will appear on your desktop.
Type this into the prompt in your Quest 2
to link your device to the computer.
Now your headset is linked,

your desktop will now
appear in your headset.
Click on "Start SteamVR."
You'll now have access
to your SteamVR games in your headset.
